Name: Bad Bad
About the game: What kind of work is this? In the game, you will play as an indestructible gunner with extremely high HP and grenades. The goal is to find a way out and get near the helicopter. The game has 5 weapons and 2 supplies to pick up or drop, including batons, pistols, shotguns, submachine guns, howitzers, medical kits and ammo packs, pick up these guys and bravely greet the enemies and roadblocks that stand in your way Bar! How to play games and save money? The game will drop in price during the discount period, if you want to save your money, please buy it after seeing the 40% off tag. What should I do if I don't like the game? You can leave a negative review in the Steam comment area, and submit a refund request to the Steam customer service in a timely manner, and the Steam customer service will agree to every reasonable refund request. 3000 studio works, thank you for playing.
